sentence.Network_cn: 他不断地对上下场的每一名队员进行解说。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin commentarius, commentarium (adjective, used as a noun), from commentari, frequentative of comminisci 'devise'

entry.tran: (广播或电视上播出的)实况解说，现场报道
entry.def: A commentary is a description of an event that is broadcast on radio or television while the event is taking place.

example.ex: He gave the listening crowd a running commentary...
example.tran: 他给这一大群听众进行现场报道。

example.ex: That programme will include live commentary on the England-Ireland game.
example.tran: 那个节目将包括英格兰与爱尔兰比赛的实况报道。

entry.def: A commentary is an article or book which explains or discusses something.

example.ex: Mr Rich will be writing a twice-weekly commentary on American society and culture.
example.tran: 里奇先生每周将就美国社会与文化发表两篇评论文章。

entry.def: Commentary is discussion or criticism of something.

example.ex: The show mixed comedy with social commentary...
example.tran: 这个节目把喜剧和社会评论结合了起来。

example.ex: When I was able to elicit only a gentle smile, I thought perhaps this was a commentary on my humor.
example.tran: 当我只能让人微微一笑时，我觉得这可能是对我幽默感的一种评价吧。

means.word_mean: 1. a written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material;

sentences.sentence: "he wrote an extended comment on the proposal"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 焦躁不安的,失去理智的
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+ment思考,神智+ed……的→去掉理智

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment思考,神智+al……的→adj.精神的,思想的,心理的,智力的,脑力的
a无+ment思考,神智+ia病→无智力的病
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment注释+ary表名词→n.注释, 解说词
mental精神的+ity表名词→n.心理,意识

stems_affixes.value_cn: 精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
stems_affixes.word_buile: ment心智+ation表名词→n.精神作用,心理状态,心智活动
ment思考,神智+ion表名词→有思考→向导,提到[词性变化:作动词]
com共同+ment思考,神智→共同思考→评论[词性变化:可作动词]
comment[n.注释,评论,意见 v.[on]注释,评论]+ate表动词→v.作实况报道,评述

sentences.en: His running commentary on the football match was excellent.
sentences.cn: 他对这次足球赛所作的实况报道十分精彩。

sentences.en: He is giving the commentary on the basketball game.
sentences.cn: 他正在对篮球赛作评论。

jushi.english: We are reading the commentary on the event .
jushi.chinese: 我们正在阅读有关这一事件的报道。

jushi.english: His running commentary on the football match was excellent.
jushi.chinese: 他对这次足球赛所作的实况报道十分精彩。
